pkgmetadata.longdescription: MIDI is the Musical Instrument Digital Interface, ALSA is the Advanced Linux Sound Architecture. This package provides accessors to data structures of the ALSA sequencer interface via the more specific types from the @midi@ package. The package also contains a orphan instances for the @alsa-seq:Event@ type of the @midi:Message.Class.Check@ and @midi:Message.Class.Query@ classes.
